name: Piranha Crisis
description:
Get the highest score by eating as many fish as possible before you run out of life. Eating a fish gives you a life, but also its power that may help you... Or not ! Watch out for the bones!

Don't hesitate to download the rom and test it in an emulator or a real GBA !

How to play
Enter : Start
Arrow keys : Move
Z : Eat

Credits
Game by Bugmobile & jeremyk6
Made for Game Boy Advance with Butano for the Juice Jam II
GBA-wasm emulator by kxkx5150
